pages.text: $(#630000)Across my travels, I have come across mobs which appear to be immune to Call of the Hive. They also turn blue when I strike them.$(br)$()[The following information is based on the default settings of the mod]
[You have Ante disabled, so none of the following milestones apply. All mechanics are active]

$(#630000)They only arrived around 10 days in, and they started off rather weak. Over time, however, they gained a host of new abilities.$(br)- For one, they seem to be capable of 'Parrying' parasites I did not create. This has a detrimental stunning effect, and makes them invincible for a short time. They also run faster than other mobs.$(br)- At around Day 20, they started summoning $(l:threat/mote)Motes$()$($#630000) to chase me, and their damage noticeably increased.

$(#630000)- On Day 30, they started healing if the damage I or other parasites dealt was too low, and started to resist potion effects with high amplifiers. I think they started to converse with each other as well.$(br)- Day 40 was when they started dealing Critical Hits, substantially increasing their damage and wiping out groups. They also started constructing $(l:threat/bounty)Bounties$()$(#630000) to hunt me down specifically.

$(#630000)- Day 50 was especially bad. Up until now armor was able to fend them off, but $(l:potions/yielding)they started using a new potion effect to nullify it.$()$(#630000)They also became much stronger in practically every metric.

$(#630000)- Day 60 was a reminder that Motes, up until then, dealt no damage (excluding bosses like the Wither). Now if that potion effect is active, they'll deal some armor-piercing damage as well. The mobs also increased the amount they create.

$(#630000)- The next few milestones just made things worse and worse, the Motes deal standard damage alongside their armor piercing, the Critical Hits are all I see now, I can't heal after they hit me, and I get a nasty sunburn whenever I go out during daytime.

$(#630000)Day 50 also brought a new drop I had never seen before: A Remnant. These discs can be used in a $(l:threat/lithograph)Lithograph$()$(#630000) to create items that I can use to fight them off. It appears only hostile mobs can drop them, however.
$(#630000)I'm also beginning to see more of them than usual. It would be safe to say something brought them here, and is continuing to do so.
